Blockbuster 2 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap two untapped permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Choose target creature you control. If this spell is a blockbuster, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
